summary: CRACKED DASHBOARD - THE DASHBOARD ON MY 2012 GMC SIERRA 1500 SERIES TRUCK HAS CRACKED ON BOTH THE DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDE.  NOW, DUE TO THE SEVERE COLD, THE CRACK ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE IS EXPANDING DUE TO THE EXPANSION AND CONTRACTION OF THE PLASTIC THRU INTERIOR HEATING AND RAPID COOLING OF THE VEHICLE.  THESE CRACKS OCCURRED DURING NORMAL DRIVING CONDITIONS ON STATE HIGHWAYS AND INTERSTATES.
